name: HexShift
description:
Navigate your way through a hex grid of pits, traps, and boxes.
Activate and reach the portal to complete the  level.

Controls: Android
Touch and drag the player (Blue Box) to move in a direction.
Controls: PC
Click and drag the player (Blue Box) to move in a direction.

Push the Green Boxes to move them.
Multiple moves can be chained together.
